data.comment: Today's referee, Francesco Fourneau, has blown to start the match.
Hellas Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, Hellas Verona have been awarded a penalty...
Miguel Veloso smashes in a penalty at Stadio Artemio Franchi. The score is now 0-1.
Fiorentina surge into the attack at Stadio Artemio Franchi but Dusan Vlahovic’s header is off-target.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 11, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Free kick Hellas Verona.
In the minute 13, Giacomo Bonaventura for Fiorentina has been booked by Francesco Fourneau and receives a first yellow card.
Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
Francesco Fourneau signals a throw-in for Hellas Verona, close to Fiorentina's area.
In the minute 15, Throw-in high up the field for Hellas Verona in Florence.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 17, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Adrien Tameze for Hellas Verona who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Hellas Verona's Adrien Tameze is back in action after a slight knock.
An attacking Fiorentina player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 19, The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Dusan Vlahovic.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
In the minute 22, In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 25, Fiorentina drive forward but Gaetano Castrovilli is judged offside.
Francesco Fourneau awards the away team a throw-in.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Federico Dimarco (Hellas Verona) gets a yellow card.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
In the minute 29, Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 32, Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 34, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Federico Ceccherini is booked for the away team.
Attention is being given to Fiorentina’s Dusan Vlahovic and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 36, Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dusan Vlahovic for the home team is judged to be offside.
Dusan Vlahovic is back on the pitch.
In the minute 37, Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Hellas Verona.
In the minute 41, Free kick Fiorentina.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Fiorentina.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
In the minute 43, In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hellas Verona's Eddie Salcedo is whistled for offside at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Fiorentina are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Pawel Dawidowicz returns to the field for Hellas Verona after picking up a slight injury.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Pawel Dawidowicz is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 46, Francesco Fourneau has blown to start the second-half.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
The away team have replaced Eddie Salcedo with Ebrima Colley. This is the first substitution made today by Ivan Juric.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 49, Lorenzo Venuti of Fiorentina gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 50, Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 51, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Giangiacomo Magnani is replacing Koray Gunter for the away team.
Antonio Barreca is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 53, Antonio Barreca for Fiorentina is back on the field again.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Fiorentina will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hellas Verona.
In the minute 56, In Florence, Giangiacomo Magnani (Hellas Verona) misses the target with a header.
Francesco Fourneau awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Francesco Fourneau awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Francesco Fourneau awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Dusan Vlahovic is back on his feet again.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
In the minute 58, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dusan Vlahovic.
Sofyan Amrabat for Fiorentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
In the minute 59, The home team has substituted Antonio Barreca with Cristiano Biraghi. Claudio Cesare Prandelli is thus making his second change.
In the minute 59, Pol Lirola is replacing Lorenzo Venuti for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Hellas Verona.
Claudio Cesare Prandelli is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Artemio Franchi with Jose Callejon replacing Giacomo Bonaventura.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Francesco Fourneau waits before resuming play because Gaetano Castrovilli for Fiorentina is still down.
Fiorentina’s Gaetano Castrovilli is on his feet again at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 62, Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hellas Verona are whistled for offside.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Igor is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 66, Igor is back on the pitch.
Darko Lazovic of Hellas Verona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 68, Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Igor (Fiorentina) has received a first yellow card.
Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) is making a third substitution, with Ivan Ilic replacing Adrien Tameze.
In the minute 71, Hellas Verona make their fourth substitution with Kevin Ruegg replacing Darko Lazovic.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hellas Verona in Florence.
In the minute 75, Free kick Hellas Verona.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Philip Yeboah Ankrah is on a sub for Mattia Zaccagni for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 79, Fiorentina's Sofyan Amrabat gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Francesco Fourneau awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In Florence Hellas Verona drive forward through Kevin Ruegg. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Hellas Verona.
Francesco Fourneau signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Hellas Verona's area.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fiorentina's Nikola Milenkovic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Franck Ribery with Borja Valero.
In the minute 85, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pawel Dawidowicz for Hellas Verona who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Pawel Dawidowicz for Hellas Verona is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
In the minute 86, Fiorentina make their fifth substitution with Patrick Cutrone replacing Gaetano Castrovilli.
Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 89, Hellas Verona's Federico Dimarco breaks free at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
